title: Detective Lucerne
description: The shrewd and intelligent Detective Lucerne is a modern day Sherlock Holmes, solving murders among affluent members of high society.
altHero: Detective Lucerne played by Ward Fowler wearing a white jacket and hat
alt1: outside a brick house with a fancy car in the driveway
alt2: Lucerne speaks with an older man in a tuxedo
alt3: another man comes in holding a gun
alt4: Lucerne sneaks into an empty office
